description:
Tree works subject to TPO 9-13 Thane Villas 1989. 

 T3:  Lime:   Crown lift to old pollard head, crown thin 30%. 

 T4:  Lime:   Crown lift to 7/8m. or break on south fork,              removing minor branches.  Crown thin 30%.              Crown reduce by 15% back to lateral branch              unions, but not to twigs or buds as growth              points. 

 T5:  Lime:   Crown lift to 7/8m. and thin and reduce as for              T4.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
